features: 1.FLORAL LETTER STATIONARY PAPER - The style of this stationary set is floral designs with lines, creating an ambiance of elegance and tranquility. Such a premium stationary paper is suitable for gift giving, not only increasing friendship with friends and family, but adding a decorative and personal touch to your party invitations, greeting cards, or handwritten letter for Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Easter, etc.

2.DISTINCTIVE VINTAGE DESIGN STATIONARY SET - This stationary paper with lines is perfect for who loves to write handwritten letters. The letter writing paper with some decoration at corner and slightly color background makes calligraphy or writing clear but elegant and impressive.

3.PRINTER-FRIENDLY & LUXURIOUS LETTER PAPER - Both letter paper and envelopes are printed on smooth recycled paper, compatible with ink jet or laser printer, fountain pen or gel pen without bleeding and ghosting. High quality stationary paper helps you write smoothly.

4.SEALING ENVELOPES SAVE YOUR TIME - Days of envelopes without glue are gone. Our stationary includes self-sticking envelopes which ends up sending a letter easily. Just use some water to make it wet to seal the envelopes, you will not be bothered to buy glue or use any sticker.

5. SPECIFICATIONS - Each stationery paper and envelopes set contains 48 stationary paper & 24 envelopes(6 individual packs with 8 Japanese stationary paper & 4 envelopes of each design, totally 6 different colors assorted), stationery paper in 7 x 10 inch, and sealing envelopes in 9 x 4 inch. The stationery paper is double sided printing, and the envelopes are sealing envelopes.
body.description: Sealing envelopes and double-sided printing stationery paper setSuch a premium stationary paper set is suitable for gift giving, increasing friendship with friends and family.Features 1. Material: Smooth uncoated recycled paper2. Package: 8 sheets of stationery paper & 4 envelopes of each pattern, 6 designs assorted. Each set of letter sheet and matched envelopes are packed in an individual poly bag and then 6 different bags put into another poly bag.3. Size: Stationery Paper - 7” x 10”, Envelope - 9” x 4”Order now to avoid disappointment.

reviews.reviewText: SO BEAUTIFUL. Very happy with purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful stationery, with lines on both sides. The quality of paper is good, so you cannot see through to the other side. The colors and prints of flowers are really nice. The lined stationery keeps your letters neat. With matching envelopes. I recommend these and would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars the envelopes are not self sealing
reviews.reviewText: I like the colors, the design and the quality of the paper. Also the way everything is wrapped separately in cellophane helps to keep the stationery in good condition -- no curls or creases. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really love being able to find stationary and love the artwork on it. But you do not get enough envelopes with the papers. My family and friends that received the few letters I sent out love the artwork and reminded some of what you used to be able to buy but I ran out of envelopes really quick and now have to use regular white envelopes to send the letters I write on the lovely papers.
